content: round 12 single_crochet 1 *decrease single_crochet 2 until last stitch 1 single_crochet 18 round 13 *single_crochet 4 decrease around 15 fo attach eyes between rounds 8 and 9 approx 5-6 stitches apart firmly stuff ears make 2 round 1 magic_ring 4 4 round 2 single_crochet around 4 round 3 *single_crochet increase 8 round 4 single_crochet around 8 round 5 *single_crochet 1 single_crochet increase 12 round 6 *single_crochet 2 single_crochet increase 16 fo leaving long tail for sewing arms make 2 round 1 magic_ring 4 4 round 2 single_crochet increase around 8 round 3 * single_crochet 1 increase 12 rounds 4-6 single_crochet around 12 round 7 * single_crochet 1 decrease 8 fo and leave tail for sewing lightly stuff tail round 1 magic_ring 5 round 2 single_crochet around 5 repeat round 2 until tail measures 3 inches fo leaving end for sewing to body cut a piece of pipe cleaner to 6 inches and fold in half thread through tail in order to be able to choose tail position assembly sew the head the body with eyes facing forward sew ears to the head starting at round 2 to round 8 on each side of the face the sew the arms in place just under the head sew the tail to the back of the body and tie a ribbon in a bow around the neck to finish thank you for purchasing this pattern i would love to see your finished product you can share your photos on my facebook page tag me on twitter @zocreates or instagram @zoe creates and you can use the hashtag #zoecreates
